copy: The offers below are available online. Additional financing offers may be available at your local dealer.

blocks.title: No interest if paid in full within 6 months<sup>1</sup>
blocks.copy: Interest will be charged from the purchase date if the purchase balance is not paid in full by the end of the promotional period.

terms.title: Cub Cadet Revolving Plan Disclosures Available 5/1/2023-7/31/2023 Commercial Cards also available. For offer details about Commercial Cards please contact your Dealer.
terms.copy: 1 No Interest if Paid in Full within 6 Months: Minimum purchase $199. To avoid interest, you must pay the full promotional balance before the promotional period ends. If you do not, you will be charged interest from the purchase date at the standard Purchase APR. After the promotional period ends, the standard Purchase APR also applies to the remaining balance and the charged interest. Minimum monthly payments required, but they will not pay off the balance in time. You must make larger payments to avoid the interest. Advertised monthly payment, if any, is greater than your required minimum payment and may exclude taxes, delivery or other charges. Prior purchases excluded. Account must be in good standing. Offer valid 5/1/2023-7/31/2023. Other finance plans may be available. Standard account terms apply to purchases that do not qualify. New accounts: standard Purchase APR 29.99%. Minimum interest charge $1. Existing accounts, see your Cardholder Agreement for applicable terms. Subject to credit approval. Cub Cadet financing account issued by TD Bank, N.A.

blocks.title: No interest if paid in full within 12 months<sup>2</sup>
blocks.copy: Interest will be charged from the purchase date if the purchase balance is not paid in full by the end of the promotional period.

terms.title: Cub Cadet Revolving Plan Disclosures Available 5/1/2023-7/31/2023 Commercial Cards also available. For offer details about Commercial Cards please contact your Dealer.
terms.copy: 2 No Interest if Paid in Full within 12 Months: Minimum purchase $500. To avoid interest, you must pay the full promotional balance before the promotional period ends. If you do not, you will be charged interest from the purchase date at the standard Purchase APR. After the promotional period ends, the standard Purchase APR also applies to the remaining balance and the charged interest. Minimum monthly payments required, but they will not pay off the balance in time. You must make larger payments to avoid the interest. Advertised monthly payment, if any, is greater than your required minimum payment and may exclude taxes, delivery or other charges. Prior purchases excluded. Account must be in good standing. Offer valid 5/1/2023-7/31/2023. Other finance plans may be available. Standard account terms apply to purchases that do not qualify. New accounts: standard Purchase APR 29.99%. Minimum interest charge $1. Existing accounts, see your Cardholder Agreement for applicable terms. Subject to credit approval. Cub Cadet financing account issued by TD Bank, N.A.

blocks.title: 0% APR for 24 months with equal payments<sup>3</sup>
blocks.copy: There is a promotional fee of $125 for this transaction.

terms.title: Cub Cadet Revolving Plan Disclosures Available 5/1/2023-7/31/2023 Commercial Cards also available. For offer details about Commercial Cards please contact your Dealer.
terms.copy: 3 0% APR for 24 Months with Equal Payments: Minimum purchase $2,000. There is a promotional fee of $125 for this transaction. 0% APR from date of eligible purchase until paid in full. Monthly payment is the purchase amount divided by the number of months in the offer. Last payment may vary due to rounding. On-time payments will pay off the promotional balance. Advertised monthly payment, if any, may exclude taxes, delivery, or other charges. Other transactions and charges affect total monthly payment amount. Prior purchases excluded. Account must be in good standing. Offer valid 5/1/2023-7/31/2023. Standard account terms apply to purchases that do not qualify. New accounts: standard Purchase APR 29.99%. Minimum interest charge $1. Existing accounts, see your Cardholder Agreement for applicable terms. Subject to credit approval. Cub Cadet financing account issued by TD Bank, N.A.

blocks.title: 0% APR for 36 months with equal payments<sup>5</sup>
blocks.copy: There is a promotional fee of $125 for this transaction.

terms.title: Cub Cadet Revolving Plan Disclosures Available 5/1/2023-7/31/2023 Commercial Cards also available. For offer details about Commercial Cards please contact your Dealer.
terms.copy: 5 0% APR for 36 Months with Equal Payments: Minimum purchase $3,000. Excludes Utility Vehicles. There is a promotional fee of $125 for this transaction. 0% APR from date of eligible purchase until paid in full. Monthly payment is the purchase amount divided by the number of months in the offer. Last payment may vary due to rounding. On-time payments will pay off the promotional balance. Advertised monthly payment, if any, may exclude taxes, delivery, or other charges. Other transactions and charges affect total monthly payment amount. Prior purchases excluded. Account must be in good standing. Offer valid 5/1/2023-7/31/2023. Standard account terms apply to purchases that do not qualify. New accounts: standard Purchase APR 29.99%. Minimum interest charge $1. Existing accounts, see your Cardholder Agreement for applicable terms. Subject to credit approval. Cub Cadet financing account issued by TD Bank, N.A.

inStore.title: Finance In-Store
inStore.copy: We have multiple financing offers to fit your needs. Financing is available at participating independent dealers.

extraLink.copy: View all online and in-store financing plans
